name: Spacey Shooty
description:
Title: Spacey Shooty

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Adventure, Space, Shooter, Arcade

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: A space invaders type asteroid game.

Instructions: Use WASD to move the ship and press space to shoot. Dodge the invaders.

Game Design Team: Demonchu – Game Designer
